resources.string: Forgot the password? Send reset email

Do you really want to mark this message as a response?

Welcome to the Forum Chat! 
Here you can quickly get an answer to any of your questions if there is one.
 First, you should confirm your mail by clicking on the appropriate button in Settings .
Secondly, itâ€™s recommended that you set your own avatar there and assign a nickname.
 To ask a question, go to the Forums tab and click the button with the + sign.
If you want to look at a question or find the right one, go to the Forums tab, the search bar is also located here.
 If you want to add a question to the tracked ones, you just need to click on the Asterisk right in the question itself, to find out when the answer will be given.
 To view the questions that you created or those that you marked as Tracked , go to the Library . There is also View History .
Nice Use!
Tap on camera to choose profile picture
